title: Desperate!! Similar to ESPN font!
content:
This reminds me of the ESPN logo, but the similar fonts that I find have the "missing line" at the TOP of the letters... I need to find the name of this very SPECIFIC font!

Thanks... I'm in a HUGE hurry..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301070307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Home3_03_4718.gif)
author: Jack Clements

comments.content: the 'missing line' is probably not part of the typeface. set SPORTS in [City Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301070307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/city-be/bold-italic/) and add the line on top. should get you pretty close (if not spot on).
